snippet: The United Nations chief aid coordinator said the delivery of aid had become harder since President Bashar al-Assad claimed re-election on June 3.
abstract: Valerie Amos, United Nations chief aid coordinator, says government of Syria's Pres Bashar al-Assad is making it harder to deliver humanitarian aid to millions of war-battered civilians in the country.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations chief aid coordinator said the delivery of aid had become harder since President Bashar al-Assad claimed re-election on June 3.

headline.main: Syrian Government Making Aid Delivery More Difficult, U.N. Official Says
